overview: The great Jageera, the most terrible of Pakistani Islamist terrorists wanted by the police of 21 countries, and his fine team of right-hand men, including the faithful Abdullah, threaten to kill the family of the Indian Prime Minister. The attempt fails thanks to the courage of doctor Suraj (Avinash Wadhavan), a successful seducer. Jageera's brother in charge of the operation is killed by the police. Jageera and his gang will then take Dr. Suraj and his wife hostage in their house. Game of power of influence and money, the tension rises dangerously between the 4 walls.
title: 7 Aatankwadi
